scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a seated king, adorned with a crown and a long beard, gesturing towards a kneeling woman who is presenting a crown. Above them, two angels are shown, one holding a crown and the other gesturing. In the background, a series of architectural structures with triangular gables and arched windows are visible, suggesting a palace or grand hall. Further in the background, a group of figures, possibly angels or saints, are depicted with halos, looking down upon the scene. The inscription "VAO. CONPLETOPIV" is present at the bottom. The overall composition suggests a scene of investiture or divine recognition.
